reviews.review: 在steam上买的第一款fps游戏，挺不错的

The greatest single player shooter ever.. the only thing close is perhaps the original.
Immersive story telling, fluid gameplay and skillful movement (despite being over a decade old), FAN-FUCKING-TASTIC pacing and level design, and every part of the game feels fresh and new, whilst maintaining the same gameplay mechanics. 

My only complaint:
Soundtrack doesn't show its face often enough! But when it does, it's usually epic.

if you have not played this game, you are not a real gamer. Buy it NOW.

By far the best game I've ever played and arguably the sole reason why my career choice is what it is today. Just like the original, Half-Life 2 set the bar incredibly high when it was released in 2004, and since then it still hasn't been topped.
Masterpiece, you will know why
Volvo HL3 pliss

[b][h1] Points positifs : [/h1][/b]
- Le gameplay est très facile à prendre en main et est évolutif (Vous débloquez les armes au fur et à mesure de l’avancement)
- Les graphismes du jeu sont potables pour un jeu sorti en 2004 (De plus, cela signifie que toutes les configs pourront faire tourner le jeu)
- Le jeu a une durée de vie assez longue (entre 10 et 20h selon la difficulté) 

[b][h1] Points négatifs : [/h1][/b] 
- Certaines phases de jeu peuvent être plutôt longues et chiantes (je dis bien certaines, pas toutes)
- Quelque légers bugs sont présents, mais rien de bien grave

[b][h1]Pour résumé : [/h1][/b]
[i] Tout comme le 1er Half-Life, celui-ci reste un jeu culte, avec des graphismes et un gameplay potable même 12 ans après sa sortie
Il faut y jouer au moins une fois dans sa vie de Gamer ! [/i]

It's honestly a pretty good game, not really worth a whole playthrough because it starts to get repetitive so just play through the first half-hour or so. As soon as you go through a teleporter you can give up on it. (I'm sorry Valve. Don't hate me.) Feel free to go past that though, it has two episodic sequels that feel like full games.
12 Years later... Still an amazing game.

The second game in the incredible Half Life series.

Obviously this game has made VAST improvements over the original. In terms of graphics, gameplay, animations, etc. Not only that but it has a modding community. Now it may not be as grand as Bethesda's modding community. But what THIS particular modding can do uniquely is make fan-base games, and other things from the engine that Half Life 2 runs on. 

There aren't any real negatives to this game. Sure the vehicle controls are bit iffy when playing on a keyboard. But that's just a nitpick. You can just play this game with a controller. 

The game is pretty straight forward like the first one. You are 'now' legendary Gordon Freeman. You are thrusted back into the world that you "left behind" to come back and realize the world is different while you've been gone. A new threat has taken over the world and now it's up to you and the Resistance to put an end to the Combine.

And of course, the game doesn't really give you everything all at once. It spoon feeds you. So don't expect all the answers to be um...answered! Lol. 

If you are a fan of the original Half Life. I recommend gettng this.

I'll move into pros and cons at the end, if you want to skip to those.

I wish, as many do, that there were some option between "Yes" and "No" for recommending. Half Life 2 isn't a bad game by any stretch of the imagination, but it blows my mind that the reviews are overwhelmingly positive. It has ups and downs, and I can definitely see why it was such a massive success when it comes out. The story is a little overworked, but compelling. It isn't particularly interesting by itself, but like many before me have pointed out, the levels are beautifully designed aesthetically speaking, effortlessly mixing in-game mechanics like cover or obstacles with an immersive setting.

That said, my single biggest gripe is the gameplay. It isn't fast enough to be a third-person bullet hell like the original, and the levels are waaaaaaaaaaay too long to be enjoyable. The Airboat scene especially comes to mind - I couldn't force myself to get all the way through it (I played it for roughly 8 hours and then quit - mostly offline, hence the low number shown).

It's a solid 7 or 8. Well polished, pretty game, and wonderful for its time. I just don't see how it holds a candle to any of the more recent games.
It is great, i play it every year. just get it you wont be let down!

It is absolutely the most amazing game I have ever come across, and it has a permanent place in my heart. It's graphics were, and are, ahead of it's time- as goes for its predecessor Half-Life and Source. They still amaze me, despite the wide-spread critical eye for highly realistic graphics today. Also, it still remains original in so many ways and it ignores cliches- this can be seen in its rather unique and well-done zombies, which are in most everything else an overused enemy. The story is just the rightly porportioned mix of intriguing, unusual, and not forceful or overly dramatic, that it constantly keeps you interested for more.

honest to god 11/10

If you only buy one game ever make it this one. This is proof video games can be art. Every second of this title is deeply immersive and beyond fun to play. The story is completely involving but there's no cutscenes to chop up your actions. The mechanics work perfectly. The environment works seemlessly with the countless, memorable, non-scripted moments. The atmosphere is so meticulously crafted and the DLC levels are worth every penny. I don' want "innovation" in today's game market. I want another masterpiece like this.
Whenever you make a negative review on this game Valve will go into panic mode and get gaben to email you to help you enjoy the game.

Бессмертная классика из мира игр! :) Поиграв впервые в 2004 году, время от времени перепрохожу её до сих пор.
Плюсы +++
- Захватывающий сюжет. Который не отпускает до самого конца. Постаппокалиптическая атмосфера.
- Графика и дизайн локаций на высоте! Даже спустя 12 лет (!) игра не мозолит глаза и выглядит симпотично.
- Реалистичная физика предметов. (сейчас это уже не вновинку, но в 2004 г. это было чем-то невообразимым!) 
- Хороший баланс оружия. У каждого оружия чувствуется отдача.
- И так далее и так далее :) Кто играл тот знает, игра не имеет недостатков.
Минусы ---
- ...episode 3 и HL3 так и не вышли :( Да и не выйдут, хватит себя обманывать.
В своё время в эту игру разработчики вложили душу и все свои силы. Гейб и сам понимает, что такого успеха ему уже не повторить в HL3. Но это наверное и к лучшему :) Лучше ничего, чем игра сделанная кое-как, что бы выкачать побольше деньжат из игроков.
My 1th game in my life. I love it, i speedrun' it. So gut.
Iconic

Half-Life 2 kolejna gra o przygodach Gordona Freeman’a. Gordon Freeman po przyjęciu propozycji pracy dla tak zwanego "G-man’a" zostaje umieszczony w wolnym portalu na 20 lat. W pewnym momencie G-man budzi naszego głównego bohatera ze snu, umieszczając go w pociągu zmierzającym do miasta nr.17. Tak rozpoczyna się fabuła jednej z najlepszych gier w które kiedykolwiek grałem. Gra owa to typowa strzelanka tyle że z rozbudowaną fabułą i elementami logicznymi.
W grze mamy do wyboru mnóstwo broni z naszego arsenału takich jak MP7,AR2 znany także jako karabin pulsacyjny, RPG z celownikiem namierzającym oraz wiele inych przydatnych broni. Nasi przeciwnicy na poszczególnych etapach są inni i wymagający myślenia typu "jak go zabić najmniejszym kosztem" mimo iż amunicja jest często spotykana równie szybko się wyczerpuje jeśli korzystamy z niej źle. Ogólnie na najtrudniejszym poziomie trudności gra jest wymagająca jednak nie niemożliwa do przejścia. Mimo lat gra oraz grafika nie są złe, a napewno jest warta pieniędzy za które można ją kupić.

PODSUMOWANIE:
Plusy:
-Duży arsenał broni
-Wciągająca fabuła
-Wywarzona rozgrywka
-Klimat
-Ciągle dobra grafika
Minusy:
-Irytacja lub znudzenie niektórymi fragmentami gry

I find this game to be slightly over-rated. That being said, it is still an excellent game, and definitely worth your time. 
My biggest complaint is that there isn't much in terms of replay value, but that just depends on what  kind of gamer you are. A completionest would find a lot of stuff to do in this game.

There's sudden euphoria you experience in a few key scenes. You could call it cathartic, a shock to the system, something unforgettable. Just call it overwhelming, I guess. It's difficult to process the sensory overload this game gives. I've never experienced anything else like it, and it scares me to think I never will again. One of the best games I've played.

Gran clásico del mundo de los videojuegos. Un juego muy notable, con una historia elaborada, personajes emblemáticos, y un mundo bien elaborado.
Sin duda estamos hablando de un juego que revolucionó por completo este mundillo, tanto en el shooter como en el resto de géneros significó un antes y después en la industria.
Una ambientación exquisita y perfectamente pulida, sistema de armas cómodo, carisma a raudales, guión impresionante, y un largo etc. Un producto sencillamente perfecto creado por los que en su tiempo eran de los mejores artesanos de estas obras de arte llamadas videojuegos, VALVE.
Indispensable para cualquier jugador que se preste. 
10/10
